Introduction

Hi, Welcome to Discoverize's template Documentation. This documentation is to help you customize Discoverize. To customize this template, Basic HTML and CSS knowledge is required.

Discoverize

Discoverize is The Best HTML Template For Discover, Buy, Rent or Sell Properties. It has nice, clean, minimal design and fully responsive. It packed with lots of features like: Interactive Search Form, Leaflet JS (Map), Swiper JS (Carousel), Photoswipe (Lightbox) .

What you'll get

  • Based on Bootstrap v5+
  • SCSS files included
  • 30++ Pages
  • 3 Colorscheme
  • Tons of Sections
  • Clean Design
  • Clean and Clear Code
  • Fully Responsive
  • Leaflet JS (Map)
  • Swiper JS (Carousel)
  • Photoswipe (Lightbox)
  • Google Fonts
  • Font Awesome
  • Flaticon
  • Valid W3C
  • Well Documented

Support

For support, you can contact to helpdesk@coolorize.com In working day (from Monday to Friday), I'll reply as soon as possible within maximum 48 hours. Support request sent during weekends will be processed on next Monday morning.

Sources and Credit

  • Leaflet JS
  • Swiper JS
  • Google Fonts
  • Font Awesome
  • Flaticon

  • Unsplash
  • Pexel
